function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Aerial spraying resulting in concerns about the environmental impact of DDT and dieldrin","Impact":"Potential harm to the environment and possibly human health","Mitigation":"Use of alternative, less harmful insecticides or spraying techniques","Technologies":"Environmentally friendly insecticides, precision spraying technology","People":"Local communities, wildlife, and environmental ecosystems","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Reduced infrastructures for spraying","Impact":"Reduced capacity to control disease vectors","Mitigation":"Investment in improved infrastructure, equipment, and training","Technologies":"Aerial spraying equipment, infrastructure development","People":"Public health authorities, government agencies","Owner":"Government agencies, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Use of DDT and dieldrin in control programs","Impact":"Potential harm to the environment, wildlife, and human health","Mitigation":"Transition to safer, more targeted insecticides or biological control methods","Technologies":"Biological control agents, environmentally friendly insecticides","People":"Local communities, wildlife, and environmental ecosystems","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental organizations"}]}
